card.name: Adarkar Valkyrie
card.property: Flying, vigilance {T}: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

card.name: Boreal Griffin
card.property: Flying {S}: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More than snow falls from the Boreal skies." —Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

card.name: Cover of Winter
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on Cover of Winter. {S}: Put an age counter on Cover of Winter.

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

card.name: Field Marshal
card.property: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.

card.name: Gelid Shackles
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. {S}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

card.name: Glacial Plating
card.property: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {S} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. {S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 for each age counter on Glacial Plating.

card.name: Jötun Grunt
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Put two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner's library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Jötun Owl Keeper
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {W} or {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Jötun Owl Keeper dies, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying for each age counter on it.

card.name: Kjeldoran Gargoyle
card.property: Flying, first strike Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

card.name: Kjeldoran Javelineer
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Kjeldoran Javelineer deals damage equal to the number of age counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Kjeldoran Outrider
card.property: {W}: Kjeldoran Outrider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I listen to people. He sniffs the wind. And we both sense something big coming. Something very big."

card.name: Kjeldoran War Cry
card.property: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Kjeldoran War Cry in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

card.name: Luminesce
card.property: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, leader of the Order of the White Shield

card.name: Martyr of Sands
card.property: {1}, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

card.name: Ronom Unicorn
card.property: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

card.name: Squall Drifter
card.property: Flying {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

card.name: Sun's Bounty
card.property: You gain 4 life. Recover {1}{W} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heidar has forced the sun into hiding, but it has not forgotten us."

card.name: Sunscour
card.property: You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Surging Sentinels
card.property: First strike Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Swift Maneuver
card.property: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

card.name: Ursine Fylgja
card.property: Ursine Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it. Remove a healing counter from Ursine Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ursine Fylgja this turn. {2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Ursine Fylgja.

card.name: Wall of Shards
card.property: Defender, flying Cumulative upkeep—An opponent gains 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: White Shield Crusader
card.property: Protection from black {W}: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn. {W}{W}: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds—and bring you home to tell of them."

card.name: Woolly Razorback
card.property: Woolly Razorback enters the battlefield with three ice counters on it. As long as Woolly Razorback has an ice counter on it, prevent all combat damage it would deal and it has defender. Whenever Woolly Razorback blocks, remove an ice counter from it.

card.name: Adarkar Windform
card.property: Flying {1}{S}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.

card.name: Arcum Dagsson
card.property: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

card.name: Balduvian Frostwaker
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

card.name: Commandeer
card.property: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

card.name: Controvert
card.property: Counter target spell. Recover {2}{U}{U} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

card.name: Counterbalance
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

card.name: Drelnoch
card.property: Whenever Drelnoch becomes blocked, you may draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.property: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature? Fire? Bah! Both are chaotic and difficult to control. Ice is structured, latticed, light as a feather, massive as a glacier. In ice, there is power!" —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Frost Raptor
card.property: Flying {S}{S}: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

card.name: Frozen Solid
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guard, fetch me a mallet." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Heidar, Rimewind Master
card.property: {2}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect!"

card.name: Jokulmorder
card.property: Trample Jokulmorder enters the battlefield tapped. When Jokulmorder enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice five lands. Jokulmorder doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you play an Island, you may untap Jokulmorder.

card.name: Krovikan Mist
card.property: Flying Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

card.name: Krovikan Whispers
card.property: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {U} or {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) You control enchanted creature. When Krovikan Whispers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

card.name: Martyr of Frost
card.property: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Perilous Research
card.property: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

card.name: Rimefeather Owl
card.property: Flying Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield. {1}{S}: Put an ice counter on target permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow.

card.name: Rimewind Cryomancer
card.property: {1}, {T}: Counter target activated ability. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

card.name: Rimewind Taskmage
card.property: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."

card.name: Ronom Serpent
card.property: Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land. When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

card.name: Rune Snag
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2} plus an additional {2} for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache." —Zur the Enchanter

card.name: Surging Aether
card.property: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Survivor of the Unseen
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {T}: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Thermal Flux
card.property: Choose one — • Target nonsnow permanent becomes snow until end of turn. • Target snow permanent isn't snow until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Vexing Sphinx
card.property: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Vexing Sphinx dies, draw a card for each age counter on it.

card.name: Balduvian Fallen
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever Balduvian Fallen's cumulative upkeep is paid, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each {B} or {R} spent this way.

card.name: Chill to the Bone
card.property: Destroy target nonsnow creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thick hides and layered armor won't help when I freeze you from the inside out." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Chilling Shade
card.property: Flying {S}: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rimewind necromancers caught travelers in mystical blizzards then trapped their spirits in the mist of their final frozen breaths.

card.name: Deathmark
card.property: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body." —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

card.name: Disciple of Tevesh Szat
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Disciple of Tevesh Szat: Target creature gets -6/-6 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

card.name: Feast of Flesh
card.property: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy." —Garza Zol, plague queen

card.name: Garza's Assassin
card.property: Sacrifice Garza's Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. Recover—Pay half your life, rounded up. (When another creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay half your life, rounded up. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

card.name: Grim Harvest
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Recover {2}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

card.name: Gristle Grinner
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

card.name: Gutless Ghoul
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone." —Garza Zol, plague queen

card.name: Haakon, Stromgald Scourge
card.property: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else. As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may cast Knight spells from your graveyard. When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Herald of Leshrac
card.property: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Gain control of a land you don't control. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Herald of Leshrac gets +1/+1 for each land you control but don't own. When Herald of Leshrac leaves the battlefield, each player gains control of each land they own that you control.

card.name: Krovikan Rot
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Recover {1}{B}{B} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.

card.name: Martyr of Bones
card.property: {1}, Reveal X black cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Bones: Exile up to X target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Puppeteered by Heidar's icy hand, they were sacrificed to the Frost Marsh to raise Haakon's army.

card.name: Phobian Phantasm
card.property: Flying; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Phyrexian Etchings
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each age counter on Phyrexian Etchings. When Phyrexian Etchings is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

card.name: Rime Transfusion
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "{S}: This creature can't be blocked this turn except by snow creatures." ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

card.name: Rimebound Dead
card.property: {S}: Regenerate Rimebound Dead. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen." —Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

card.name: Soul Spike
card.property: You may exile two black cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Soul Spike deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Stromgald Crusader
card.property: Protection from white {B}: Stromgald Crusader gains flying until end of turn. {B}{B}: Stromgald Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The White-Shielders think their code justifies their actions. In truth it only binds their hands."

card.name: Surging Dementia
card.property: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Target player discards a card.

card.name: Tresserhorn Skyknight
card.property: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Tresserhorn Skyknight by creatures with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

card.name: Void Maw
card.property: Trample If another creature would die, exile it instead. Put a card exiled with Void Maw into its owner's graveyard: Void Maw gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Zombie Musher
card.property: Snow landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow land.) {S}: Regenerate Zombie Musher. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The World Spell thawed their icy graves, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But Heidar called them to duty for a twisted cause.

card.name: Balduvian Rage
card.property: Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks." —Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Balduvian Warlord
card.property: {T}: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

card.name: Braid of Fire
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Add {R}. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

card.name: Cryoclasm
card.property: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

card.name: Earthen Goo
card.property: Trample Cumulative upkeep {R} or {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Earthen Goo gets +1/+1 for each age counter on it.

card.name: Fury of the Horde
card.property: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Goblin Furrier
card.property: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

card.name: Goblin Rimerunner
card.property: {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {S}: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

card.name: Greater Stone Spirit
card.property: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

card.name: Icefall
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. Recover {R}{R} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

card.name: Karplusan Minotaur
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Flip a coin. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Karplusan Wolverine
card.property: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

card.name: Lightning Serpent
card.property: Trample, haste Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

card.name: Lightning Storm
card.property: Lightning Storm deals X damage to any target, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on Lightning Storm. Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

card.name: Lovisa Coldeyes
card.property: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed!"

card.name: Magmatic Core
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

card.name: Martyr of Ashes
card.property: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

card.name: Ohran Yeti
card.property: {2} {S}: Target snow creature gains first strike until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

card.name: Orcish Bloodpainter
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Rimescale Dragon
card.property: Flying {2}{S}: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Rite of Flame
card.property: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

card.name: Skred
card.property: Skred deals damage to target creature equal to the number of snow permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing." —Ukoten, centaur chieftain

card.name: Stalking Yeti
card.property: When Stalking Yeti enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to Stalking Yeti. {2}{S}: Return Stalking Yeti to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

card.name: Surging Flame
card.property: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Surging Flame deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Thermopod
card.property: {S}: Thermopod gains haste until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Sacrifice a creature: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

card.name: Allosaurus Rider
card.property: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

card.name: Arctic Nishoba
card.property: Trample Cumulative upkeep {G} or {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Arctic Nishoba dies, you gain 2 life for each age counter on it.

card.name: Aurochs Herd
card.property: Trample When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

card.name: Boreal Centaur
card.property: {S}: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

card.name: Boreal Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

card.name: Brooding Saurian
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents they own.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave." —Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

card.name: Bull Aurochs
card.property: Trample Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

card.name: Freyalise's Radiance
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Frostweb Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Frostweb Spider blocks a creature with flying, put a +1/+1 counter on Frostweb Spider at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its white webs glitter, mimicking the frost on the tree's branches.

card.name: Hibernation's End
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you pay Hibernation's End's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Hibernation's End and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Into the North
card.property: Search your library for a snow land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya." —Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Karplusan Strider
card.property: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

card.name: Martyr of Spores
card.property: {1}, Reveal X green cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Spores: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

card.name: Mystic Melting
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.

card.name: Ohran Viper
card.property: Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Whenever Ohran Viper deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

card.name: Panglacial Wurm
card.property: Trample While you're searching your library, you may cast Panglacial Wurm from your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge." —Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

card.name: Resize
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Recover {1}{G} (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

card.name: Rimehorn Aurochs
card.property: Trample Whenever Rimehorn Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs. {2}{S}: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

card.name: Ronom Hulk
card.property: Protection from snow Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Shape of the Wiitigo
card.property: Enchant creature When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Sheltering Ancient
card.property: Trample Cumulative upkeep—Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Simian Brawler
card.property: Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's odd to see the apes rip down trees to arm themselves in defense of their forests." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Sound the Call
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Wolf creature token. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Steam Spitter
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {R}: Steam Spitter gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its belly produces a boiling-hot fluid it can spit as a weapon or spin slowly enough to freeze into a defensive web.

card.name: Surging Might
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Blizzard Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Blizzard Specter deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • That player returns a permanent they control to its owner's hand. • That player discards a card.

card.name: Deepfire Elemental

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin." —Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper

card.name: Diamond Faerie
card.property: Flying {1}{S}: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Garza Zol, Plague Queen
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever a creature dealt damage by Garza Zol, Plague Queen this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol. Whenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Juniper Order Ranger
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

card.name: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
card.property: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage—yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.

card.name: Tamanoa
card.property: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.

card.name: Vanish into Memory
card.property: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Wilderness Elemental
card.property: Trample Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

card.name: Zur the Enchanter
card.property: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

card.name: Coldsteel Heart
card.property: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

card.name: Jester's Scepter
card.property: When Jester's Scepter enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of target player's library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. {2}, {T}, Put a card exiled with Jester's Scepter into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

card.name: Mishra's Bauble
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Phyrexian Ironfoot
card.property: Phyrexian Ironfoot doesn't untap during your untap step. {1}{S}: Untap Phyrexian Ironfoot. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature—it just wasn't interested in moving.

card.name: Phyrexian Snowcrusher
card.property: Phyrexian Snowcrusher attacks each combat if able. {1}{S}: Phyrexian Snowcrusher gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its plow wasn't designed for snow, but to carve a path through shrieking armies.

card.name: Phyrexian Soulgorger
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a creature. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian minds that constructed it did not live past its awakening.

card.name: Thrumming Stone
card.property: Spells you cast have ripple 4. (Whenever you cast a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as the spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Arctic Flats
card.property: Arctic Flats enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A realm once green now ruled by Frost, Where flesh and field both pay its cost. Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

card.name: Boreal Shelf
card.property: Boreal Shelf enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who will stay the Tyrant's hand, As ice and woe both grip our land? The helpless feel his frozen brand." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

card.name: Dark Depths
card.property: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it. {3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths. When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.

card.name: Frost Marsh
card.property: Frost Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now caged in Winter's bitter chill, Our people cry, their voices shrill— Eternal cold breaks down their will." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

card.name: Highland Weald
card.property: Highland Weald enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our noble land, enslaved by Rime, Is it our fate to freeze through time? If this be true, oh wicked crime." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

card.name: Mouth of Ronom
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}{S}, {T}, Sacrifice Mouth of Ronom: It deals 4 damage to target creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

card.name: Scrying Sheets
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

card.name: Tresserhorn Sinks
card.property: Tresserhorn Sinks enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our land oppressed by silent Cold, We weary wretches, young and old, Pray that Springtime loose his hold." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings
